thread.title: Trump, Afghanistan's Ghani, discuss security, counterterrorism cooperation | Reuters
thread.title_full: Trump, Afghanistan's Ghani, discuss security, counterterrorism cooperation | Reuters

title: Trump, Afghanistan's Ghani, discuss security, counterterrorism cooperation | Reuters
text:
World News | Thu Feb 9, 2017 | 7:11pm EST Trump, Afghanistan's Ghani, discuss security, counterterrorism cooperation 
WASHINGTON U.S. President Donald Trump and Afghan President Ashraf Ghani discussed opportunities to strengthen ties, security, counterterrorism cooperation and economic development during a telephone call on Thursday, the White House said in a statement. 
Trump also emphasized the continuing importance of the U.S.-Afghanistan Strategic Partnership and his support for the government, the statement said. 
(Reporting by Eric Walsh; Editing by Sandra Maler) Next In World News
